name: Push It! (itch) (Freddeboj, Speldesign - Skurup/Fridhem)
description:
Push It! is a 3D, third-person, singleplayer game where you get to play as Hazel the Squirrel!  Your objective is to push a huge Hazelnut up a path to reach The Big Tree.  Test your gamer might and complete the push!  Hopefully without dying too many times ;)

This is a Unity game I made during four weeks as a school project at https://www.skapaspel.se/ I wanted to see if I could make an engaging game inspired by the Greek myth of Sisyphus.  Most of the development time went into making movement and systems work.  Hence the short lenght of the game. 

Controls:

- Mouse to navigate menus

- Pause = Esc on keyboard, Select or Start on gamepad

- Move = WASD or Arrow keys on keyboard, L Stick or R Stick on gamepad

(I recommend playing with a gamepad.)

If people like it I might expand upon the game and add more detailed levels.

So please comment in case you try my game.  I would love to receive your feedback! :)
